title: Gigi Hadid Branded Racist and Accused of â€˜Mockingâ€™ Asians By Squinting her Eyes Next to a Buddha
text:
She was also attacked because her singer beauâ€™s father is British Pakistani, making Malik part Asian. 
Gigiâ€™s Palestinian-American father, Mohammad Hadid, is also Middle Eastern. 
â€œppl are so blind to anti asian racism as someone thats had to deal w ppl making fun of my eyes for 16 yrs i hope gigi hadid falls in a hole,â€ one angry post read, while another said: â€œAsking for a friend does gigi hadid no her bf is part asian bc when she made fun of asians sheâ€™s also insulting him (and billions more.) @zainzayns @GiGiHadid somethings arent a joke thats mockery and very disrespectful to that religion.... â€” CellyPHTStyles (@cellybill) February 5, 2017 
Lots of people also jumped to Gigiâ€™s defense though insisting she wasnâ€™t doing it to offend anyone, and the backlash she was receiving was uncalled for. 
â€œYou guys will do anything to find something negative about her just remember her man is asian too,â€ wrote a fan in her defense. Other Asians said they werenâ€™t offended and thought sheâ€™d been criticized too harshly. â¤Only a toxic mind will perceive hugging a chocolate laughing Buddha as racist ğŸ™ #PracticeHappiness #PracticeKindness pic.twitter.com/NggEhuJXas
